short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate AI-powered posts or comments in Bluesky

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Bluesky experience with AI-powered responses! This extension helps you craft intelligent, contextual replies with just one click.

Features:
- Quick Responses: Generate instant replies with different tones (agree, funny, question, etc.)
- Custom AI Replies: Create personalized responses that match your voice
- Professional Integration: Set your role and industry for more authentic engagement
- Multiple Styles: Choose from various interaction types
- Easy-to-Use: Simple interface integrated right into Bluesky's compose box

Perfect for:
- Active Bluesky users looking to engage more efficiently
- Professionals managing their social presence
- Anyone wanting to craft better responses quickly

Get started with 10 free AI-generated replies! No credit card required.
